expected_behavior: Agent dispatches to Develop (new) mode based on 'create' keyword in arguments
Agent validates name 'my-analyzer' as kebab-case, ≤64 chars, no conflicts in skills/
Agent runs 'uv run wagents new skill my-analyzer' to scaffold
Agent loads references/frontmatter-spec.md for frontmatter configuration
Agent loads references/proven-patterns.md to classify applicable patterns
Agent follows 6-step Develop (new) workflow: Understand → Plan → Scaffold → Build → Validate → Iterate
Agent produces a complete SKILL.md with dispatch table and critical rules at minimum
Agent runs 'uv run wagents validate' before declaring completion
